title: Loading Screen Not opening
body: Every time I start a league game, I go into champion select and all goes well until I begin waiting for the loading screen. The league of legends logo will open and then my screen goes black for a little while and then closes. I can still click the league button and it will come up as a black screen and then close league.  I have to restart my computer several times before I can get into the game and by the time I do, the game is already at least 5 minutes in.

replies.body: I can hear all of the sound in-game but it does not open.

Hi cmse,

Please see our recent post on this issue [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/zgUdmTen-firewall-errorblack-screen-after-champion-select).

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=jT1YhdIA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-17T04:44:55.332+0000)
>
> Hi cmse,
> 
> Please see our recent post on this issue [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/zgUdmTen-firewall-errorblack-screen-after-champion-select).

Doesn't work :/
